title: SCTIMST Notification 2025 - Walk-in interview for Junior Technical Assistant Posts
description: The Sree Chitra Tirunal Institute of Medical Sciences and Technology (SCTIMST) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Junior Technical Assistant Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their Diploma can apply for the SCTIMST Notification 2025 . The interested applicants can attend the walk-in interview. Here we have mentioned the education detai...
